Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Generator output instability. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 15/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
